casebody.data:
No. 11-502. Blue Mountain School District, et al., Petitioners v. J. S., a Minor, Through Her Parents, Terry Snyder and Steven Snyder, et al. 565 U.S. 1156, 132 S. Ct. 1097,

181 L. Ed. 2d 978,

2012 U.S. LEXIS 726. January 17, 2012.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Same case below, 650 F.3d 915.
